data.text: Best value of anyplace I've ever stayed, and I've travelled in 70 countries!  Nice room with balcony overlooking the forest, huge and delicious breakfast, use of the beautiful spa and grounds, and nearby hiking trails.  Was so great I decided to spend a whole month here!
data.title: Best value of anyplace I've ever stayed

data.text: A very good place to relax and rest. Lots of sun on the terrace, swimming pool in the complex, beautiful ocean view. Nice contact with the owner. Close to the center, shops and the beach. The port offers many attractions and excursions. The apartment is new and clean. Comfortable beds. I will definitely come back to this place.
data.title: Nice Place

data.text: This evaluation is about the thermal pools which are located next to the hotel. As a native of this region, I go to the thermal baths from time to time, which gies me an opportunity to see the decay of management there. Namely, the pools are fine, the criteria for hygiene are very reasonable, compared to some hotels in the city. However: the visitors who do not follow up the rules and regulations about using these pools are not warned by the people who are in charge of taking care of these pools. It is clear that the management does not want to scare people by enforcing these rules. Wearing a cap should be compulsory for everybody. Other than that it's just fine.
data.title: Mismanagement Problems

data.text:
My wife and I were some what disappointed by the cleanliness of the place, our room was a tight squize and everything felt warn or either broken and our bathroom stank of rotten egg with just a very unhyginic looking bath tub. The pictures are not true to the condition. When I called to report this, I was told the manager would call back, but nothing after that. We ended up having showers strickly in the indoor and outdoor pool showers that were also unpleasant, but at least the water wasn't smelly, just an awful experience.

On booking I mentioned that my wife and I were newly wed and it's our first trip together and if they could treat us, but nothing was done and the place seems like a place for the ill and elderly. Staff seem miserable.

Some pools not were not in service so the outdoor waterpark was somthing i was looking forward to but that was half a disappointment.

The breakfast was a large selection of cheese and olives, but the hot food was always cold. I could go on, but we concluded to simply do not recommend.
data.title: Expected more, the pictures misrepresent the place.
